introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this video is すいてい which you will often hear in discussions involving data analysis or making predictions. Imagine how much more natural your Japanese will sound when you can say things like "We can estimate the cost next month," "His age is an estimation based on his appearance," and "The forecast was not an accurate estimate" in Japanese. Let's get started!
meaning_explanation_english: The word すいてい means estimation or inference. It refers to the act of making an educated guess or conclusion based on available information.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 推測 : すいそく : guess
見積もり : みつもり : estimate
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the すいてい are 推測 (すいそく) and 見積もり (みつもり). 推測 refers more to guessing or inferring without all the necessary information, while 見積もり is often used in the context of cost estimates or approximations, making it more specific than 推定.
antonyms: 確定 : かくてい : decision
詳細 : しょうさい : details
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the すいてい are 確定 (かくてい) and 詳細 (しょうさい). 確定 means certainty or confirmation, indicating a firm conclusion, and 詳細 refers to details or specifics, highlighting the absence of ambiguity that contrasts with the nature of estimation.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼は結果を推定を行う。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼（かれ）は結果（けっか）を推定（すいてい）を行（おこな）う。

translations.EN: He makes an estimation of the results.
translations.ES: Él hace una estimación de los resultados.
translations.VI: Anh ấy thực hiện việc ước lượng kết quả.
translations.FR: Il fait une estimation des résultats.
translations.TL: Gumagawa siya ng pagtataya ng mga resulta.
translations.MY: သူသည်ရလဒ်ကိုခန့်မှန်းနေသည်။
translations.HI: वह परिणाम का अनुमान लगाता है।
translations.FA: او یک برآورد از نتایج انجام می‌دهد.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼の年齢は推定される。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の年齢(ねんれい)は推定(すいてい)される。

translations.VI: Tuổi của anh ấy được ước lượng.
translations.MY: သူ၏အသက်ကို ခန့်မှန်းသည်။

example_sentences.kanji: このデータはすいてい値に基づいています。
example_sentences.furigana: このデータはすいていちに（もと）づいています。

translations.EN: This data is based on the estimated value.
translations.ID: Data ini didasarkan pada nilai estimasi.
translations.ES: Estos datos se basan en el valor estimado.
translations.VI: Dữ liệu này dựa trên giá trị ước tính.
translations.FR: Ces données sont basées sur la valeur estimée.
translations.NE: यो डाटा अनुमानित मानमा आधारित छ।
translations.BN: এই তথ্যটি অনুমানিত মূল্যের উপর ভিত্তি করে।
translations.ZH: 这些数据是基于估计值。
translations.KO: 이 데이터는 추정 값을 기반으로 합니다.
translations.TL: Ang data na ito ay nakabatay sa tinantyang halaga.
translations.MY: ဒီဒေတာသည် ကန့်သတ်ထားသောတန်ဖိုးကို အခြေခံထားသည်။
translations.HI: यह डेटा अनुमानित मूल्य पर आधारित है।
translations.AR: تستند هذه البيانات إلى القيمة المقدرة.
translations.FA: این داده بر اساس ارزش تخمینی است.

example_sentences.kanji: 彼の試験のすいてい結果は良かった。
example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)の試験(しけん)のすいてい結果(けっか)は良(よ)かった。

translations.EN: His estimated result on the exam was good.
translations.ES: Su resultado estimado en el examen fue bueno.
translations.VI: Kết quả ước lượng của anh ấy trong kỳ thi là tốt.
translations.FR: Le résultat estimé de son examen était bon.
translations.NE: उसको परीक्षाको अनुमानी परिणाम राम्रो थियो।
translations.BN: তার পরীক্ষার অনুমিত ফল ভালো ছিল।
translations.ZH: 他考试的估计结果很好。
translations.TL: Ang natiyak na resulta niya sa pagsusulit ay maganda.
translations.MY: သူ့စစ်တမ်းအတွက်အထိုးအမြတ်ရလဒ်ကကောင်းခဲ့ပါတယ်။
translations.HI: उसकी परीक्षा का अनुमानित परिणाम अच्छा था।
translations.FA: نتیجه تخمینی او در امتحان خوب بود.

presumption.MY: ခန့်မှန်းမှု

estimation.MY: ခန့်မှန်းမှု

parts_of_speech: Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
Noun, Suru verb, Transitive verb, Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
